doc.title: Hot Property
doc.plot: Alice Beer presents the game-show in which first-time buyers try to win their first step on the property ladder. In each episode features a young couple desperately in need of a home of their own. The contestants view 3 properties, pick their favorite and then guess the price. If they guess within the allotted amount, they win the house of their dreams. Programmes filmed in the UK, along with specials giving British couples a chance to win their dream home in Spain.
